nodes.bodyText:
sink.max-retries configuration in JdbcBatchingOutputFormat is similar with this, could you also have a change?
BTW, Commit message should contain issue id etc, following
https://flink.apache.org/contributing/code-style-and-quality-pull-requests.html

throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format(
    "The value of '%s' option shouldn't be negative, but is %s.",
    LOOKUP_MAX_RETRIES.key(),
    config.get(LOOKUP_MAX_RETRIES)));
Use the option variable instead of hard code the option key.
I think it can equal to zero?
